build.buildCommand: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npm run build && echo '=== BUILD COMPLETED ===' && ls -la dist/ && find dist/ -name '*' -type f && echo '=== NEST BUILD OUTPUT ===' && cat nest-cli.json && echo '=== CHECKING MAIN.JS ===' && ls -la dist/main.js || echo 'MAIN.JS NOT FOUND' && echo '=== ALL DIST FILES ===' && find dist/ -type f -name '*.js' -exec ls -la {} \;
